title: The IRS Moves To Keep Its Cut of Porn Tips
description: The agency has proposed excluding tips received from "pornographic activity" from a new tipped wage deduction.
content: A new tax deduction for tipped wages seemed like good news for all sorts of service workersincluding those in sexually oriented industries. After all, anyone in a sector that has "customarily and reg… [+12892 chars]
